title: Get several performance measures of (effect estimation) simulation studies — performanceMeas
Get several performance measures of (effect estimation) simulation studies — performanceMeas
text: vecEst vector estimated effect values simulation repeats vecSe vector estimated standard error simulation repeats vec.p vector significance (probability sampled null hypothesis) simulation repeats theta true value effect alpha Type error rate = significance level testing null hypothesis

title: Get several performance measures of (effect estimation) simulation studies — performanceMeas
text: Vector Performance measures: Average estimates parameter interest Empirical standard error assessment estimation uncertainty Bias = mean deviation estimates true value parameter interest indicator accuracy Coverage confidence interval measurement can used control Type error Empirical power = proportion simulation samples H0 effect rejected significance level H0 false

title:
Get performance measures from effect estimation within all
repeats of the simulation — simulation
text: anzSim Number simulation repeats type Study design type = "cross-sec" cross-sectional  "long" longitudinal sigma.1 Within variability error variance (Hughes&Hussey sigma) sigma.2 individual variance (used individuals followed time: longitudinal study) sigma.3 clusters variability (Hughes&Hussey tau) K Number time points (measurement) J Number Individuals (=individuals per cluster) Number cluster mu.0 Baseline mean within model specification theta Intervention effect betas Time trend included X Design matrix building linear model given ooptimal study X.Design matrix building linear model sampling real data given real setting B.cond Condition type cluster loss: 0 = cluster loss, 1 = Cluster missing random, 2 = Cluster missing beginning, 3 = Cluster missing end study C.cond Condition number clusters getting lost D.cond Condition Number individual loss (chosen randomly individuals within study)

title:
